website_summaries.verdict: An affordable choice for a leather work shop apron.
pros: Does a great job of protecting your clothing from sparks
Provides more protection than heavy canvas
Straps cross in the back to defer weight from your shoulders
cons: Designed with fewer pockets than most on the market

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured or advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Apron delivered was a tan, Randor brand apron, with white straps. Length was also 34" not 36" and a rivet was missing from the front out of the bag. All in all this was a different apron; different color, different build, shorter length, diffrent brand. Not what I wanted or needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Weird fit. Wonky straps
customer_reviews.text: The strap system is a little wonky. Works ok if you can get the straps turned the right direction and figure out which arm goes in which hole. I'm a small guy and couldn't adjust the straps to fit close. Still the apron felt oppressive and didn't move well. Used for plasma cutting and after first use found that everywhere a hot piece of metal landed the leather shrunk and now I have a warped apron. Still works. I suppose leather does that anyway so its not the products fault. Might be more appropriate for different activities
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The worst strap design I've tried, a flimsy piece of leather is all that's used to keep the straps crossing properly behind your back. ( A stiff piece of rawhide would have been better IMHO ). After donning and doffing a few times, the straps get all tangled and it's a struggle to put on correctly. I no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this apron yesterday and wore it for several hours in the shop today while doing grindling and drilling operations. The apron is light weight and comfortable to wear. It was around 70 in the shop and after an hour or so I forgot I was wearing it. There was no smell to the leather unless you really put your nose in it. The straps and belt were easy enough to figure out and adjust. The apron is rather thin suede and not stiff at all. Wish I'd found this apron before.
customer_reviews.author: JimW

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and the straps that secured it around your neck and waist are all interconnected so it makes it very difficult to take on and off. I modified the straps so one is adjustable goes around my waist and the other is permanently static and goes around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Stylish Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks authentic
customer_reviews.text: I use this for protection while blacksmithing. Works great and looks authentic. The fit. I'm a broad shouldered guy and this is a bit tight on me. If your skinny this should fit you no prohlem.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for his birthday and he just loves it. He wears it for blacksmithing and when he works in his shop. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great apron for the money. Must be on slender side to wear
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed with brass rivets too, but if your waist size is larger than a 42, it might not fit right. I'm a 36 and fits me fine. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: paul gilson

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: plan to break it in soon...but it is perfect size and will work for me...
customer_reviews.author: Tom Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great spark protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron because I was tired of burning holes in clothes from sparks due to angle grinders and blacksmith sparks. I can say that it is well worth the money because now whenever I know there will be sparks around I reach for this apron every time. It is comfortable and not a hindrance, as well as being adjustable. I would recommend this to anyone dealing with sparks in any capacity.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As a gunsmith, keeping the chemicals and metal shavings off is sure nice.! This is a well made apron and gets used almost daily in my shop. I can tell this will last for years.!
customer_reviews.author: Curt Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather but to small
customer_reviews.text: The leather portion is as expected but my wife had to get material and lenghten the straps to fit my 6' 200lb body. They need to offer sizing or inform buyers it's a small-med size.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hooed it would be..
customer_reviews.text: I was going to surmise my toy making husband for Christmas. But he found it. Now I cant get it off him.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Hackett

customer_reviews.title: THICK SUEDE
customer_reviews.text: THE PRICE IS RIGHT. i bought this to help if a piece of wood gets away from me in the shop. i have already been punched in the gut by a flying piece so i decided to get this. along with my face shield and resperator i now feel a bit more comfortable. it is not KEVLAR but for the price it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID A CAVALLARO

customer_reviews.title: It smelled at first but after airing out it's fine. I no longer have pockets full of sawdust ...
customer_reviews.text: For me it's 5 stars for fit but I'm 5-7, 180 lbs. Anybody much bigger than me may have issues. It smelled at first but after airing out it's fine. I no longer have pockets full of sawdust which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Drool

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband, not being sure of the style he wanted. I chose this apron because it is longer than most and the straps cross in the back and connect at the waist. I was afraid he would want more pockets, but after he used it for a partial day he agreed that lower pockets would fill with shavings. He likes the longer length and the look. So glad I didn't have to return it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelley J. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad Not Good
customer_reviews.text: One rivet came out immediately because it was poorly pressed. Leather is medium quality but it does keep heavy chips from cutting while I am power carving.
customer_reviews.author: Black Oak Hollow

customer_reviews.title: fits great, and when adjusted properly
customer_reviews.text: fits great, and when adjusted properly, hangs well, does not weigh on neck. I put it on the first thing when I enter the shop, keeps a lot of sawdust off my shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for my aspiring blacksmith fiance and was definitely not disappointed. Beautiful quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my aspiring blacksmith fiance and was definitely not disappointed. Beautiful quality, great fit, and one happy man on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitie St. Jean

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My father loves this! It works great and is saving his shirts when he is forging his hand made knives.
customer_reviews.author: Kitana2

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 3 1/2 stars. This apron will keep the sparks and chips off, and the construction is better than most. The leather is not what I should call top quality, but it is thick enough to get the job done and the stitching looks like it should last for several years. The older tillman products, when they were made in USA, seemed to be heavier duty.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our hobbist blacksmith in the family. It fits his needs perfectly. Length is great and adjustable straps hold it comfortably in place while protecting the wearer from sparks and flying metal.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Workshop Approved
customer_reviews.text: I wish the strap was a little longer, but the Apron is exactly what I was looking for. Simple and good quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Olig

customer_reviews.title: great quality, fast
customer_reviews.text: Just what my step father was wanting, great quality, fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: jacq

customer_reviews.title: it fit's my 5'6 200lb husband fine. No issues with the straps
customer_reviews.text: It's made of soft flexible suede. it fit's my 5'6 200lb husband fine. No issues with the straps. He wears it while he does his wood carving.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: awesome apron
customer_reviews.text: i work in an iron foundry and after having to throw away a few shirts and watching my coveralls get torn up from grinding parts, i'm very glad i got this apron. it's saved my budget big time from getting new clothes only to watch them get destroyed by grinding iron.
customer_reviews.author: john macsweeney

customer_reviews.title: Good apron
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built apron, good design and proper size, good leather, also good construction, really protects you body.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL LYNN ADKINS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The only reason I put 4 instead of 5 stars is that the little peice that holds the straps together in the back twists and tangles all the time.
customer_reviews.author: D O

customer_reviews.title: this was really a great purchase -- wear it all the time -- light
customer_reviews.text: this was really a great purchase -- wear it all the time -- light, comfortable, keeps the sawdust off, pockets for my rules and pencils -- just what i needed
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: It is a really nice apron for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice apron for the price. The suspender system is ehh... I cut about 10 inches off the bottom b/c it was so long. It is however very comfortable. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: hersh12307

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, Fiance is a chef and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: mtn girl

customer_reviews.title: Good shop apron
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good general purpose shop apron. The chest pockets are useful for a pencil and steel ruler. Kinda wish there was a pocket or two lower down, at hip level for a tape measure, but all around a good value.
customer_reviews.author: rrb

customer_reviews.title: Leather Apron
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality leather apron. The person who received it really appreciated the quality. Have not seen it on.
customer_reviews.author: masimpson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little snug for me, but it fits. Just wish it were a tad roomier.
customer_reviews.author: Brains Ironically

customer_reviews.title: The leather is good enough but the straps on back seem to never ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is good enough but the straps on back seem to never fit right no matter how I adjust it
customer_reviews.author: Josh lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. Fits me well (I am 5'7"), Does not stink and looks like a value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JasonAz

customer_reviews.title: Saves your clothes!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me multiple burns while welding! Better price than anywhere else I looked
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gravier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5-10 250lbs and it fit me with a sweat shirt on. No bad odors and straps are nice. They must have made some product changes. Great protection for a machinist
customer_reviews.author: downrangeflyer

customer_reviews.title: My guy just started blacksmithing. He loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: My guy just started blacksmithing. He loves it. Saw a lot of people have issues with the straps. He takes it off and hangs it up and doesn't have problems.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Good quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather. First time I wore it the leather dye "bleed" a lot. Ruined a pair of trousers.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Great leather apron. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light weight leather apron. I am 6'1" and 170 lbs, with a 32" waist. This apron fit perfectly right out of the packaging with no adjustments and smells nice and leathery, but not too much. I use it for gunsmithing, and it's perfect for that purpose. Keeps the oils and solvents off your clothes very well. Honestly after awhile the apron starts to look better with stains and wear. Aside from the new style clip buckle, this could pass for a 19th century blacksmith's apron. This would be a great apron for a wide variety of hobbies or jobs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bburnsbell

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: The die in the material will get on your cloths!! Wash will remove it. Seems very durable. Going on week three.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted to protect my legs
customer_reviews.text: heavy material just as advertised just what i wanted to protect my legs why do you have to enter a certain number of words when they are not needed
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I checked with my son and he enjoys his gift. He received it and certainly he would have told me if he hadn't received it in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: mdamon

customer_reviews.title: It is made with very thick leather and just great all around
customer_reviews.text: This apron surpassed my expectations. It is made with very thick leather and just great all around.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Chedville

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise very nice for
customer_reviews.text: Straps are kind of confusing, and I wish it had pockets of some kind, but otherwise very nice for LARPing
customer_reviews.author: Michael Quinn

customer_reviews.title: but looks great. Had it laser engraved by local sign shop ...
customer_reviews.text: Bit thin material, but looks great. Had it laser engraved by local sign shop to complete the gift. Looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brewer Greg

customer_reviews.title: Apparently there have been updates
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe previous reviews. No stink and quality leather. Combined with good a straps and workmanship, this will last for years. I also added some leather protectorant, which gives it a cool look.
customer_reviews.author: A Doshi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice apron! Well made with good craftsman ship. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: ellemak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for routing, sanding, welding, wood turning, and any other dirty tasks!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Santoscoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he welds at times and it was just what he needed. He really likes the durability of the apron.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great so
customer_reviews.text: No complaint, except that I have a hard time figuring out the straps on occasion. The wife loves this, 'cause it keeps most of the oil and metal shards off of my clothes. Holding up great so far
customer_reviews.author: Kirby W. Gaal

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke
customer_reviews.text: It’s light working 8hr shifts in a fabrication shop is good for that, how ever, the strap that goes around your back and latches in, ripped out clean out the leather , not good
customer_reviews.author: Welder

customer_reviews.title: meant for metalwork but works as protection in any dry activity
customer_reviews.text: i use it for woodwork. keeps flying chips from hitting me directly. nice bib.
customer_reviews.author: captsiva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Keeps the grinding particles off of your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes this. He thought it was great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Spraggette

customer_reviews.title: They need to be more like a regular apron strings
customer_reviews.text: The straps are to hard to use . They need to be more like a regular apron strings. But did it's job like a champ. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for the $
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I am a wood carves and needed some lap protection. Not too thick so it lays but thick enough to keep the chisels out of my body.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Metiva

customer_reviews.title: Bought this apron for use while operating our lapidary saws ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this apron for use while operating our lapidary saws and grinders to keep water off. Works well for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality reasonably priced but not meth for an extra large
customer_reviews.text: Not made for an extra large person , small to medium even large but not extra large
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad because he makes knives. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kason

customer_reviews.title: wrong size and for the price it wouldn't be cost ...
customer_reviews.text: wrong size and for the price it wouldn't be cost effective to send it back. So I modified it to make it work.. would not order again
customer_reviews.author: Terry Batterman

customer_reviews.title: Good apron for the great price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband, who 6'1" and 200lbs. This fits him well, and he said it's holding up and providing the protection he needs. Even though we knew before making this purchase that the straps would be a bit confusing, it's frustrating none the less. The design could be simpler. It's otherwise a great apron for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice apron and, unlike some of the previous reviews, I had no trouble figuring out the strap configuration. Only drawback is the finish will stain your clothing on the side next to your body of you work in a hot enviorment and prespire. During my first use, I sweated thru my shirt and the apron and my shirt front looked like it had been tanned too. No spark burn-thru though! Should have hosed it off, scrubbed it and let it drip dry before use. My bad. Four stars for a well made and heavy duty product.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to dislike about this leather apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron is a weight which I like, has well attached and appropriately broad straps which cross in the back for a comfortable and secure fit. In all regards it seems to be very well made and I would definately buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Steffy

customer_reviews.title: good and bad
customer_reviews.text: good quality leather. the only problem is saw dust clings to it.
customer_reviews.author: richard finley

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my artisan daughter. She was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: stray

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a wood shop
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, perfect for a wood shop. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. My nephew was father elf in a Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. My nephew was father elf in a Christmas program and it looked perfect with his elf costume.
customer_reviews.author: Donita Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: No More Damaged Clothing
customer_reviews.text: I can now buy clothes for my husband without worrying that he will wear them to work once and destroy the clothes for social wear. Adjustable size-fit, heavy-weight suede leather (not armor grade, for rennies and larpers). Fits to just above knee-area on most men.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Bulkley

customer_reviews.title: Leather Apron
customer_reviews.text: Though I would have liked to have had a 4ft apron they don't seem to be around. This 3ft apron fills the bill anyway for what I need in my shop. It seems to be made very good. The leather seems very good and not hard. The remarks about the X of the straps in your back seems to be pointless. It is adjustable and has to be somewhere. I had no trouble with it. If you need a shop apron, this is a good one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son lives it. It is just what he needed for the metal work he does! No more ruining shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Airola

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Woodshop
customer_reviews.text: Really like this for the woodshop, good protection, easy to put on and take off. Pockets are handy for the ruler and pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Stinks!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what chemicals Tillman has asked the Chinese who made this to use, but does it ever smell! Makes it difficult to breath even. Hung it in the shed for over a week and it still stinks. Tried to use it, any place my skin touched it would breakout in a rash. Plus, it stained the clothing that I was wearing. I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality apron! The straps can be a bit easy to get tangled up but they hold it on securely and the apron doesn't shift around at all really
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Tillman apron
customer_reviews.text: Very handy when you need to protect your clothes without putting on a full set of leathers. I also like the chest pockets.
customer_reviews.author: B.H.

product_meta.title: G & F Products Leather Welding Apron Heat Flame Resistant Heavy Duty Work Apron with 2 Pockets, 36" Long with back adjustable back and neck straps for Men & Women, color Brown, 24"Width x 36"Long (9100-36)
product_meta.description: Size:24"Width x 36"LongLeather Welding Apron Heat Flame Resistant Heavy Duty Work Apron with 2 Pockets, 36" Long with back adjustable back and neck straps for Men & Women, color Brown
feature_bullets: Heat resistant leather protects against spark and offers extended wear
2 pocket design allows to put any handy tools with the apron
made of premium cowhide leather for max endurance and wear and tear

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
